subject: I can rightly tell you that
body:
I can rightly tell you that since 2017 the US Financial Crimes
Enforcement Network (FinCEN) has warned all scammed victims in the US.
Europe and Asia to contact the right office in Africa to check if
their name is on the United Nations compensation funds list. That
should be the first thing you do, and not responding to several emails
on a daily basis all promising to deliver millions to you, you don't
need anyone to tell you these emails are fake and from impostors.
These impostors even impose the FBI, and CIA. Homeland Security and
every Bank. If you suffered a scam or lost money to scammers then try
and find out from the designated department in charge of compensation
fund files
From 2017 to date hundreds of scammed victims has been receiving
compensation funds while a lot of other have been losing more money to
scammers and the difference is dealing with the right persons who
guarantee you nothing but the truth. If you continue to listen and
attend to all the emails you receive offering you millions, you will
do that for a very long time and continue to lose your money. The pure
truth is that you have legitimately approved funds but itâ€™s only you
who will release more information to contact Ms. Jane Marriott OBE,
the British High Commissioner to Kenya at email: ( 
fileo186@yahoo.com
) to get all the truth about your funds. If you
know the truth, no scammer will succeed in lying or taking advantage
of your desperation to receive your funds. You should never have
stress receiving your fund if you remember what compensation means. In
your receipt of this message, you are to acknowledge the receipt of
this mail-in by returning the required below to the Logistic
Department by email listed below the office of Reconciliation and
Logistics Vaults
Your Full Name
Phone and Fax Number
Your age and Current Occupation
Residence Address
Note: that every money you have sent out, the Financial Crimes
Enforcement Network (finCEN) are taking records and monitoring
information for possible financial crimes because that is the only way
they combat domestic and international money laundering, terrorist
financing, and other financial issues. In case if found this message
in the spam folder, it could be due to your Internet Service Provider
ISP So kindly move to your inbox before replying
Regards
Ms. Jane Marriott OBE
The British High Commissioner to Kenya

subject: Re:    I can rightly tell you that
body:
Hello Ms. Jane Marriott OBE,

Thank you for your detailed message. It's quite alarming to hear about all these scams happening around the world. I appreciate your efforts in trying to combat this issue.

I'm curious, how does the US Financial Crimes Network work with other countries to ensure that victims are protected? Also, could you explain more about the United Nations funds list? How can one check if their name is on it?

I'm also interested in understanding more about how these impostors operate. How do they manage to pose as reputable organizations like the FBI and CIA?

Lastly, you mentioned a designated department in charge of fund files. Could you provide more information about this department and its role?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Edgar
